Class LoadBitmapBytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.LoadBitmapBytes

  • public class LoadBitmapBytes
extends java.lang.Object
    The Load Bitmap Bytes class. The class is resposible for extracting the colour bytes (RGB) from a bitmap in Revelation
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sean Hamlin
